about_the_game:
Nanokings is a Roguelite RPG Bullet hell game where you try to survive the onslaught of evolved beasts and viking tribes augmented by punk machinery. Increase your power by collecting mysterious powders that allow you to choose items or upgrades in the norse dystopia of Myrkrafjordur!

Fight, die, upgrade, try again (die again)! Conquer your enemies and unlock ever increasing difficulties! The fight for survival never ends! Welcome to the unforgiving world of Nanokings!

FIGHT EVOLVED MONSTERS


Boss fights involve huge creatures or vikings equipped with the craziest armors and powerful punk augmentations. Watch out for their abilities and mobs they summon! If you can kill them you will progress to the next stage or keep on fighting until the next boss appears.

EACH RUN IS DIFFERENT!


Each character has their own main weapon, and can choose from a random pool of items at the start. Along the way you will collect new weapons and items from slaying enemies, finding new attachments and breaking objects for different rewards! Procedurally generated maps will give you a different feel each time while finding caves, exploring the plains and entering portals to different areas of the world!

DEEP PROGRESSION


Characters have different skill trees and permanent power ups can be unlocked after each run. Finding the right item builds and power up combination is the only way of getting through the story and difficulty levels, unveiling more of the world of Myrkrafjordur to explore with every run!

UNCOVER THE STORY OF NANOKINGS


In 2082, the viking tribes had achieved world domination. Their victory, however, rings hollow as, despite their significant technological achievements, they find themselves too late to reverse the damage inflicted to the world through centuries of ceaseless warfare. Humanity prepares to face its end as hunger and further conflict engulf the Earth.

Our story takes place 307.500 years later, and the world is forever changed.

Thick clouds have blocked out the sun, shrouding the world in darkness, leaving only a precious few hours of sunlight before the cruel, cold night begins. Monsters followed suit, heavily evolved animals, products of centuries of evolution and adaptation to this new harsh, unforgiving landscape.
From the remnants of humanity, a new force rises to challenge their dominion!

Bigger, stronger and armed with machinery and uncovered ancient power, these new humanoids push back against the endless darkness, men meeting beasts within the ruins of their ancestral home, beneath the blackened skies, to claim their rightful place in this world!




Welcome to Nanokings!

Main Features


[X] Multiple characters to unlock
[X] Skill tree for each character to level up
[X] Multiple weapons to upgrade and evolve
[X] Items and attachments to collect
[X] Breakable objects
[X] Procedurally generated maps
[X] Rich world of lore
[X] Mobs, mini-elites, elites, mini-bosses, bosses and elite bosses to defeat
[X] Consumables to use and temporary increase your power
[X] Steampunk Vikings dystopia to explore
[X] Other unique tribes to fight
[X] Play the game with your friends or against them online

content_descriptors.notes: Cannibal tribes, Violent drug induced vikings, Jacked up evolved creatures, blood splatters and death animations.

name: Nanokings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 GTS / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
